William Linker

Student - Writer - Maker

About Me

Hello! I'm William Linker, an undergraduate student at UMBC, pursuing a degree in Media and Communication Studies, with a minor in Journalism.

Alongside my academic interests, I write (primarily science fiction) short stories. I'm also a part of the "Maker" movement, focusing on woodworking and 3D Printing.

Experience

  • Marketing Intern @ The Babe Ruth Birthplace Museum
  • Tour Guide and Duty Officer @ The Fire Museum of Maryland
  • Editorial Intern @ Jmore: Baltimore Jewish Living
  • Assistant Manager @ Breakout Games (Baltimore)
  • Student Engagement Intern @ UMBC Hillel

    Portfolio

  • Jmore Author Page
  • Morsr (HackUMBC 2017)
  • "Digital Geographic" Magazine

    Social Media
